item.title: A SPAC Might Make Sense Now If Not for the Carnage
item.description: SPACs: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly Special purpose acquisition companies (SPACs) have been all the rage in recent years. These shell companies raise money from investors with the goal of merging with a private company, which then goes public through the SPAC, bypassing the traditional IPO process.
